project_plan.name: Weather Fetching CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API and displays the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Set up environment and install necessary libraries
Implement feature to fetch weather data from the public API
Parse the JSON response to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement a function to display the fetched weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the weather fetching and display features
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
